Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your recent purchase with RH Contract. Your merchandise has successfully shipped and your order is now closed!
Based on our Terms agreement, please provide a method of payment for your order. You may refer to the attachment in this email for the balance that is owed to RH. The attachment will also provide instructions with how payment can be accepted.
If you have any questions, please contact your RH Contract Project Manager or contact Todd Harvey, Leader, Accounts Receivable at tharvey@rh.com.
Thank you for your prompt attention to resolving this matter.
Sincerely, RH Contract
